lead_paragraph: RED SNOW.--A correspondent of The Rochester Democrat thus remarks upon the red snow found in the Arctic regions by the Rescue and Advance. "How many new things excite the wonder of this age. The Red Snow was known on the Alps more than 2000 years ago. Pliny mentions it in his history. Agassiz found it in abundance on the glaciers of the Alps a few years ago.
